roleset.name: search or inquire in a meddlesome way
roleset.note: NOSE-V NOTES: Roleset by Julia based on internet search; adjectival 'nosy' based on BOLT-6. Member of Vncls ferret-35.6. Comparison to ?ferret?. (from nose.01-v)

example.name: nose-v: All args
example.text: I was nosing around the kitchen for something to make for my son's lunch.
example.arg: for something to make for my son's lunch.

roleset.name: tending to butt in
roleset.note: NOSY-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from nosy.01-j)

example.name: nosy-j
example.text: In today 's society , the reason why a lot of uncivilized behaviors prevail and spread mainly is that [no one]-1 is willing *PRO*-1 to be nosy , for fear of their own good intentions being counterattacked by violence .
example.arg: for fear of their own good intentions being counterattacked by violence

example.name: nosy-j
example.text: i have a neighbor who-1 *-1 is nosy into everybody bussiness.

example.name: nosy-j
example.text: My Family Is Nosy About My Dating Life
